title: cannot sync blocks
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `v1.10.25`
OS & Version: Linux

after run command : geth  --http --http.api web3,eth,n,debug --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --http.port 8545 --syncmode snap --gcmode archive  nothing found but this logs below and did not sync any block 

INFO [09-16|08:20:29.817] Looking for peers                        peercount=2 tried=24 static=0
INFO [09-16|08:20:40.149] Looking for peers                        peercount=1 tried=25 static=0
WARN [09-16|08:20:45.896] Served admin_peers                       conn=172.17.0.1:54288 reqid=1 duration="9.66µs"   err="the method admin_peers does not exist/is not available"
WARN [09-16|08:20:46.390] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.17.0.1:54288 reqid=1 duration="12.159µs" err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available"
WARN [09-16|08:20:48.584] Dropping unsynced node during sync       id=ef618c0997063d36 conn=dyndial          addr=95.217.88.31:30303 type=Geth/v1.10.23-stable...
INFO [09-16|08:20:50.482] Looking for peers                        peercount=1 tried=42 static=0

WARN [09-16|08:24:40.399] Served parity_netPeers                   conn=172.17.0.1:35458 reqid=1 duration="8.389µs"  err="the method parity_netPeers does not exist/is not available
You need a consensus/beacon client running and connected to Geth. https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/08/24/mainnet-merge-announcement
